docs.snippet: “The New York City subway is this great equalizer,” said the photographer Andre Wagner, who spent four years taking photographs on its platforms and in its cars. “For this brief moment in time, we’re all in it together.”

headline.main: An Ode to Acts of Kindness on the New York City Subway
